description: Numerators of coefficients in an asymptotic expansion of the confluent hypergeometric function F(1-b; 2; 4b).
references: Henrici, Peter; Automatic computations with power series. J. Assoc. Comput. Mach. 3 (1956), 10-15.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: Let f(x) = [sum_{k>=1}(3/(2*k+1)) * x^(2*k+1)]^(1/3) = x + (1/5)*x^3 + (18/175) * x^5 + ...; let g(x) be the Lagrange inversion of f(x), g(x) = REVERT(f(x)) = 1 - (1/5) * x^3 + (3/175) * x^5 + .... Then a(n) = numerator((2 * n + 1) * coeff(g(x), 2*n+1)). - _Sean A. Irvine_, Jun 20 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Jun 20 2013
